files.description: CLI-capable Python module that creates the outputs directory and writes initial artifact files (REPORT_OUTLINE.md, CASE_STUDY_TEMPLATE.md, METADATA_SCHEMA.md, CASE_STUDIES_INDEX.csv) in an idempotent, safe manner.
Holds the full default template contents for each initial artifact and provides helpers to render and validate them before writing to disk.
Provides robust CSV read/write utilities to create and validate the starter CASE_STUDIES_INDEX.csv intake table with required columns and proper quoting.
Provides path resolution and filesystem safety utilities to ensure all writes stay under the project root and support dry-run behavior.
Defines the package metadata and an executable entry point for running the initializer as a command.
Documentation explaining how to run the initializer, what files it creates under outputs, and how to extend the templates and metadata schema.

missionDescription: Create /outputs plus initial artifacts: REPORT_OUTLINE.md, CASE_STUDY_TEMPLATE.md, METADATA_SCHEMA.md (or META.md), and a starter CASE_STUDIES_INDEX.csv to serve as the single intake table for exemplars.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Directly satisfies 'artifact-first execution' by creating the missing /outputs scaffolding and templates needed to standardize multimedia metadata collection and enable QA to evaluate concrete deliver...
projectName: /outputs plus initial artifacts: REPORT_OUTLINE.md, CASE_STUDY_TEMPLATE.md, METADATA_SCHEMA.md (or META.md), and a starter CASE_STUDIES_INDEX.csv to serve as the single intake table for exemplars.
